ygData.subject: Test Problem fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: Although they haven t said much about this, apparently it was caused by some other code they introduced and was unintended.  See below. Is there anything that
ygData.messageBody:
Although they haven't said much about this, apparently it was caused by some
other code they introduced and was unintended. See below.

Is there anything that has been put in to in any way limit the duration of a
continuously sung song? If 'aye', then why and when? If 'nay', then it's a
bug and we can help from there.
A player had the answer:

The 'your song stops abruptly' message never happens on test now, songs are
back to normal. It is fixed.

Absor concurred:

That's true.

- Alan

-----Original Message-----
From: JESSICA_WEBBER@... [mailto:JESSICA_WEBBER@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 08, 2000 10:08 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] LEHP!





Kitasi wrote:

my monk has died several times as mobs stood over me ignoring me and
my sliver of health only to have a bard pulse accel and get smacked. It
does not stand you back up, it just breaks the feign.

***

Makes sense. First thing doctors on TV do is check for a pulse. <g>

Peace
Evulia
